additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Popcorn (76%) (Corn), Vegetable Oil [Palm Oil*, Anitoxidant (307)], Salt [Anticaking Agent (341)], Natural Butter Flavour, Natural Colour (Carotene).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value:
Food Warnings:
Children should be supervised when cooking this product.
Children should be supervised when cooking this product.
Do not stop and restart your microwave whilst popping corn.
Do not stop and restart your microwave whilst popping corn.
Do not try to cook unpopped corn kernels. It is normal for some to remain unpopped.
Do not try to cook unpopped corn kernels. It is normal for some to remain unpopped.
